answer:
Thought it was interesting to see which airports have the most bird strikes (may want to avoid them!).

It looks like here are the top 3:
1. Dallas Ft. Worth
2. Barksdale Air Force Base (wont be going)
3. Chicago O'Hare

I also thought it was interesting that the time of day you are most likely to experience a birds strike is:
1. Day
2. Night
(not dusk or dawn)


Also interesting that the month with the highest bird strikes is:
1. October

And also interesting that the month/day combo to avoid is:
1. Day in August
2. Day in July
3. Night in October
